title: String Rotation
statement:
# String Rotation

Check if one string is a rotation of another.

## Problem Description

A rotation of string S is obtained by moving some characters from the beginning to the end. For example, "lloHe" is a rotation of "Hello".

Given two strings, determine if one is a rotation of the other.

## Input Format

Two lines, each containing a string.

## Output Format

Print `YES` if one is a rotation of the other, `NO` otherwise.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ length ≤ 1000
- Strings contain only alphanumeric characters
